entry.def: A fantasist is someone who constantly tells lies about their life and achievements in order to make them sound more exciting than they really are.

example.ex: Singleton was a fantasist who claimed to have a karate blackbelt.
example.tran: 辛格尔顿是个牛皮大王，他自称有一条空手道黑带。

auth_sentence.content: So is Julian Fellowes a fantasist or a fabulist?

auth_sentence.res_content_con: So is Julian Fellowes a fantasist or a fabulist?

auth_sentence.content: His barrister told the jury that Naseer was a fantasist who would have made a "rubbish terrorist".
